name: CliKintoneTest-13 Should return the error message when missing the --guest-space-id option and the app is in a guest space.
fullName: features/common.feature#CliKintoneTest-13 Should return the error message when missing the --guest-space-id option and the app is in a guest space.

steps.name: Given Load app ID of the app "app_in_guest_space" as env var: "APP_ID"
And Load username and password of user "user_for_guest_space" as env vars: "USERNAME" and "PASSWORD"
When I run the command with args "record export --base-url $$TEST_KINTONE_BASE_URL --app $APP_ID --username $USERNAME --password $PASSWORD"
Then I should get the exit code is non-zero
And The output error message should match with the pattern: "ERROR: Please specify --guest-space-id option to access an App in Guest Spaces."

labels.name: suite
labels.value: CliKintoneTest-13 Should return the error message when missing the --guest-space-id option and the app is in a guest space.
